abstract: The brewers are said to be in friendly talks as InBev has raised its offer to $70 a share from $65.
snippet: The brewers are said to be in friendly talks as InBev has raised its offer to $70 a share from $65.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Anheuser-Busch and the Belgian brewer InBev climbed sharply on Friday as the two began friendly talks to create the world’s largest brewer in a deal for about $50 billion.

headline.main: InBev Raises Its Offer for Anheuser-Busch
headline.print_headline: Deal Talk Turns Friendly, And Brewers’ Shares Rise

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
